title: Virtual City: Paradise Resort v1.1 (Full)
description:
New buildings, new product chains, new challenges! After winning the hearts of millions of players, the best-selling city builder game, Virtual City, gets its long-awaited sequel! 

In Virtual City 2: Paradise Resort, youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll get to expand your activities to the shining coast of Florida, snowy lands of Alaska, rocky mountains of Utah and arid tundras of Nevada. 

Complete 4 challenging locations with unique missions while fulfilling special goals like launching a Casino, building a Ski Resort and constructing an Ice Hotel. 

Offices and hotels, restaurants and clubs, museums and fitness centers Ã¢â‚¬â€œ access the widest selection of buildings to make your very own Virtual City unique and prosperous.

TRY IT FREE, THEN UNLOCK THE FULL ADVENTURE FROM WITHIN THE GAME!

- 52 Challenging Levels in 4 Settings: Blustery Utah, Sunny Florida, Snowy Alaska, Steamy Nevada 
- 29 Distinct Mission Scenarios 
- 73 Types of Buildings 
- 42 Types of Goods to Transport and Trade 
- 12 Production Chains to Master
